citation.article-title: Nomenclature of Prochloron didemni (Lewin 1977) sp. nov., nom rev., Prochloron (Lewin 1976) gen. nov., nom. rev., Prochloraceae fam. nov., Prochlorales ord. nov., nom. rev. in the class Photobacteria Gibbons and Murray 1978.

p.s: Prochloraceae (Pro.chlo.ra'ceae. M. L. n. Prochloron type genus of the family; -aceae ending to denote a family; M.L. fem. n. the Prochloron family)
Members of the family Prochloraceae are unicellular photosynthetic procaryotes, containing chlorophylls a and b , but not phycobilins.
At present the family comprises a single genus Prochloron.
